meanings: search for[trace] a lost boy[dog, purse]

vlive.korean: 안 할 거야? - 너는 했잖아 너 초심을 잃은 거야 지금? You won't? - You did it? You lost your initial resolution? 듣기 View video ATEEZ : 티니야 맏즈 왔다🙋‍♂️
vlive.english: You won't? - You did it? You lost your initial resolution?

vlive.korean: "길 잃은 아이들의 하나님 메뉴에 대한 당신의 생각은 무엇입니까?" "What do you think about God's Menu by lost children"? 듣기 View video GOT7 : 여러분 망해쒀요(영재아루쓰)
vlive.english: "What do you think about God's Menu by lost children"?

vlive.korean: [생기를 잃은 계란볶음밥] 어떻게 이렇게 맛없게 보일 수 있지? [The fried rice looks dead] How can you make it so unappetizing? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [iKON] 애호박 좀 크면 어때 동동차누 깜찍함이 터지고 난 광대가 터지는 걸..💥🥘 (DK&CHAN’s cooking&eating show)
vlive.english: [The fried rice looks dead] How can you make it so unappetizing?

vlive.korean: 저는 오늘 잃은 게 많은... It's the V LIVE we lost many... 듣기 View video N.Flying : 우리 얘기 좀 합시다 #21
vlive.english: It's the V LIVE we lost many...

vlive.korean: 재범이 형 아까 뭔가 집 잃은 고양이... JB seemed like a lost cat before... 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) "니가 부르는 나의 이름" Dance Practice (Name Tag Survival Ver.)
vlive.english: JB seemed like a lost cat before...

examples.korean: a mercy mission to aid homeless refugees 발음듣기 집을 잃은 난민들을 돕는 구호 임무 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a mercy mission to aid homeless refugees 발음

examples.korean: My rucksack seems to have gone walkabout. 발음듣기 내 배낭이 길을 잃은[어디 딴 데 가 있는] 모양이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My rucksack seems to have gone walkabout. 발음

examples.korean: The hat had become limp and shapeless. 발음듣기 그 모자는 흐물흐물해져서 제 모양을 잃은 상태였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hat had become limp and shapeless. 발음

examples.korean: He’s a lost soul. 발음듣기 그는 길 잃은 영혼이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
My life seemed aimless. 발음듣기 내 삶이 방향을 잃은 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
